AJAX Settings: Any program which browses store pages (be it search engine bot or customer's browser) sends information about itself (so called user agent string). Field above is used to match any of semicolon separated values inside user agent string and to decide whether bot or real user is currently browsing.
AJAX Instellingen: Any program which browses store pages (be it search engine bot or customer's browser) sends information about itself (so called user agent string). Field above is used to match any of semicolon separated values inside user agent string and to decide whether bot or real user is currently browsing.

AJAX Settings: Enable this option to see error messages if AJAX features do not work as intended
AJAX Instellingen: Enable this option to see error messages if AJAX features do not work as intended

AJAX Settings: Recommended setting is 'Wrap into HTML element'. Other settings provided for backward compatibility.
AJAX Instellingen: Aanbevolen instelling is 'Wrap in HTML-element'. Overige instellingen bestaan voor backwards-compabiliteit.

AJAX Settings: Recommended setting is 'Yes for Users, No for Search Bots' because search bots crawl non-AJAX pages better while users prefer AJAX page refreshes
AJAX Instellingen: Aanbevolen instelling is 'Ja voor gebruikers, nee voor zoek-bots' omdat zoekbots niet-AJAX pagina's beter crawlen terwijl gebruikers AJAX preferen voor verversen

AJAX Settings: Yes for Users, No for Search Bots (Listed Below)
AJAX Instellingen: Ja voor gebruiker, nee voor zoek-bots (Zie lijst hieronder)
